name: Beach Bugs [Concept / Demo]
description:
There are few things worse than the bugs summer brings. Annoyance, disease... murder. These are all things that follow the hot, humid air.

Beach Bugs is a horror visual novel that follows a group of friends on their trip to the beach. Booking a cabin for the week to unwind, in addition to the summer fun, they find bugs, their bites, and something very... familiar.

This is currently a concept / demo that I hope to flesh out in the future. Be out on the look for that!

Made for the 4th annual Spooktober Visual Novel Jam!
